00023 typedef struct
00024 {
00025         // symbol (Henkan-kyu)
00026         DWORD                   symbolColor;
00027         DWORD                   symbolColorOff;
00028         DWORD                   symbolColorText;

00038 
00039         // composition string

00042         DWORD                   compColorConverted;
00043         DWORD                   compColorTargetNotConv;
00044         DWORD                   compColorInputErr;

00046         DWORD                   compColorText;
00047 
00048         // caret
00049         BYTE                    caretWidth;
00050         BYTE                    caretYMargin;
00051 } IMEUI_APPEARANCE;
